source_quote: Daily candle’s expansion varies from 100 to 200 pips... Juda Swing ideally not more than 30-40 pips

signature.condition: IF Daily candle shows bearish bias and Juda Swing (Market Protraction) is 30-40 pips during London Killzone (LOKZ)
signature.action: THEN expect reversal at HOD and continuation toward draw on liquidity
signature.drawer_basis: HTF bias and Juda Swing size criteria

source_quote: When CBDR and or Asian Range is larger than 50 pips... avoid trading LOKZ the next day

signature.condition: IF CBDR range exceeds 50 pips with high volume/momentum
signature.action: THEN avoid trading LOKZ the next day

source_quote: attach 2 equal CBDR size boxes higher... expect Juda to reverse inside 1-SD/2-SD range

signature.condition: IF bearish HTF bias + Juda Swing reaches 1-SD/2-SD of CBDR (measured via rectangle tool) into bearish PDA (e.g., SIBI, breaker, FVG)
signature.action: THEN expect reversal toward sellside liquidity

source_quote: Price drops below NY Midnight Open into 1-SD/2-SD range & bullish BISI

signature.condition: IF bullish HTF bias + price drops below NY Midnight Open into 1-SD/2-SD of CBDR with bullish BISI
signature.action: THEN expect LOKZ to set LOD and expand toward buyside liquidity

source_quote: Juda can’t be 55–60 pips... big red flag that it’s larger than it should be

signature.condition: IF Juda Swing exceeds 50 pips during CBDR/Asian Range
signature.action: THEN treat as red flag for low-probability trading day
